sqlMap.select: select count(*) from SYS_ITEM si where si.TYPE = #type# and si.SUB_TYPE = #subtype# and si.IS_DELETED='N' and si.P_SUITABLE like concat('%',(select name from SYS_ITEM si where si.ID=#id#),'%');

select * from SYS_ITEM si where si.TYPE = #type# and si.SUB_TYPE = #subtype# and si.IS_DELETED='N' and si.P_SUITABLE like concat('%',(select name from SYS_ITEM si where si.ID=#id#),'%') limit #start#, #stop#;

select si.* from ( select sp.* from SYS_PACKAGE sp left outer join SYS_ITEM si on si.ID=sp.PACKAGE_ID where sp.PACKAGE_ID = #value# and si.IS_DELETED='N' ) p
left outer join SYS_ITEM si on si.ID=p.ITEM_ID where si.IS_DELETED='N';
sqlMap.delete: update SYS_ITEM set IS_DELETED=#isDeleted# where ID=#id#;
sqlMap.update: update SYS_ITEM set NAME=#name#, DISPLAY_NAME=#displayNameCN#, RESOURCE_STABLE=#resourceStable#, RESOURCE_CHANGEABLE=#resourceChangeable#, TYPE=#type#, SUB_TYPE=#subType#, LEVEL=#level#, MODIFIED_DESC=#modifiedDesc#, W_ID=#wId#, W_CHANGE_IN_TIME=#wChangeInTime#, W_MOVE_SPEED_OFFSET=#wMoveSpeedOffset#, W_CROSS_OFFSET=#wCrossOffset#, W_ACCURACY_DIVISOR=#wAccuracyDivisor#, W_ACCURACY_OFFSET=#wAccuracyOffset#, W_MAX_INACCURACY=#wMaxInaccuracy#, W_PENETRATION=#wPenetration#, W_DAMAGE=#wDamage#, W_RANGE_MODIFIER=#wRangeModifier#, W_FIRE_TIME=#wFireTime#, W_RELOAD_TIME=#wReloadTime#, W_AMMO_ONE_CLIP=#wAmmoOneClip#, W_AMMO_COUNT =#wAmmoCount#, W_AUTO_FIRE =#wAutoFire#, W_TIME_TO_IDLE =#wTimeToIdle#, W_NORMAL_OFFSET =#wNormalOffset#, W_NORMAL_FACTOR =#wNormalFactor#, W_ONAIR_OFFSET =#wOnairOffset#, W_ONAIR_FACTOR =#wOnairFactor#, W_MOVE_OFFSET =#wMoveOffset#, W_MOVE_FACTOR =#wMoveFactor#, W_NORMAL_UP_BASE =#wNormalUpBase#, W_NORMAL_LATERAL_BASE =#wNormalLateralBase#, W_NORMAL_UP_MODIFIER =#wNormalUpModifier#, W_NORMAL_LATERAL_MODIFIER =#wNormalLateralModifier#, W_NORMAL_UP_MAX =#wNormalUpMax#, W_NORMAL_LATERAL_MAX =#wNormalLateralMax#, W_NORMAL_DIR_CHANGE =#wNormalDirChange#, W_MOVE_UP_BASE =#wMoveUpBase#, W_MOVE_LATERAL_BASE =#wMoveLateralBase#, W_MOVE_UP_MODIFIER =#wMoveUpModifier#, W_MOVE_LATERAL_MODIFIER =#wMoveLateralModifier#, W_SPECIAL_RANGE=#wSpecialRange#, W_SPECIAL_LASTTIME=#wSpecialLasttime#, W_SPECIAL_HURT=#wSpecialHurt#, W_SPECIAL_LASTHURT=#wSpecialLasthurt#, W_PARTICLEMUN=#wParticlenum#, W_SHOW_SPEED=#wShowSpeed#, W_DMG_MODIFY_TIMER_MAX=#wDmgModifyTimerMax#, W_DMG_MODIFY_MIN=#wDmgModifyMin#, W_DMG_MODIFY_MAX=#wDmgModifyMax#, W_CAPSULE_HEIGHT=#wCapsuleHeight#, W_CAPSULE_RADIUS=#wCapsuleRadius#, W_DAMAGE_MODIFER=#wDamageModifer#, GUN_PROPERTY1=#gunProperty1#, GUN_PROPERTY2=#gunProperty2#, GUN_PROPERTY3=#gunProperty3#, GUN_PROPERTY4=#gunProperty4#, GUN_PROPERTY5=#gunProperty5#, GUN_PROPERTY6=#gunProperty6#, GUN_PROPERTY7=#gunProperty7#, IS_VIP=#isVip#, IS_NEW=#isNew#, IS_HOT=#isHot#, IS_WEB=#isWeb#, IS_POPULAR=#isPopular#, IS_EXCHANGE=#isExchange#, IS_ASSET=#isAsset#,
